attributes.action: stop the introduction of the Local Government Bill in providing greater power to councils.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The greatest concern of allowing Local Councils the ability to introduce by-laws; it is seen that some councils have not shown full commitment to local residences at this current time.  It has already been seen that councils can not adequately control agents for parking etc.  Allowing councillors to create laws without sufficient review or legal knowledge is deemed inappropriate.
